---
name: spectre-console
description: Defines how to gather information and research Spectre Console and its plugins
---

Spectre Console is a SDK for writing beatiful terminal applications.

You can read the code and documentation from the GitHub repositories using the GitHub MCP at these repos:

- https://github.com/spectreconsole/spectre.tui
- https://github.com/spectreconsole/spectre.console
- https://github.com/spectreconsole/spectre.console.cli
- https://github.com/spectreconsole/examples
- https://github.com/spectreconsole/errata
